title: Will Samuel L. Jackson Make A Good Villain? - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 07.12.18
description:
Andy and Nick talk about the new projection stills from Glass, new pics of a young Newt Scamander, what the hell is Nathan Fillion up to, and Die Hard turns 30!

Time Stamps-
-James McAvoy, Bruce Willis and Samuel L Jackson get treated in Glass first look (21:00 mins)
-Robin Williams gets his just due in documentary ‘come inside my mind’ (31:04 mins)
-Nathan Fillion posts a picture of Drake with a caption of “Sic Parvis Magna”  (32:25 mins)
-First look at a young dumbledore (39:35 mins)
-Die Hard 30th anniversary (44:30 mins)
-Daily dose of the Swedish King (52:45 mins)

Thanks to https://Twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
